page.title: 12The Newport Hunt
page.content: The hunt started in Newport 155 years ago by Walter Gifford.The{hunt}gathers every year on Boxing day. Through out the country{Boxing day}is a traditional day of sport. The hunt meets outside the Royal Victoria Hotel which was built in the same year as the hunt started,1830.The{hunts}men come from from surrounding villages and towns.The magority come from Albrighton.The{hounds}live in kennels at Albrighton.They are well fed with meat and oats.There are 37 hounds in a pack.At the hunt the hounds must stay in groups.The man who looks after the hounds is called a wipper inn. This years master of the hunt is Mr. Webster.
